text: The Independent Party of Burkina (, PIB) was a political party in Burkina Faso. In 2014 Maxime Kaboré was the chairman of the party.Le Front républicain a-t-il fait long feu? Les Echos du Faso ==History== The party failed to win any seats in the 2012 parliamentary elections,Public report 2012 CENI in which its national list received 0.25% of the vote.Legislative elections in the national constituency CENI The party held its first congress in Ouagadougou on 7 and 8 June 2014.1er Congrès du Parti indépendant du Burkina : Maxime Kaboré contre la révision de l’article 37 mais pour le référendum Monsano It subsequently joined the Republican Front alliance. ==References== Category:Defunct political parties in Burkina Faso
title: Independent Party of Burkina
